entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] WebView EvaluateJavaScriptAsync returns an incorrect result #15233
    Backlog
  • Using a Brush in the App resources causes memory leak #15231
    .NET 8
  • PopupPage: Screen goes black outside frame on iOS #15230
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Orientation: At landscape orientation "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" controls are not visible. #15229
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Resize: After resizing the font size to largest name of the "Meal types" present under 'Search by meal type' are not visible. #15228
    .NET 8
  • SwipeView should Notify on Closing/Closed state. #15227
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_Screen Reader: Talkback focus is not moving correctly when we try to edit in "Ingredients" and "Recipe". #15226
    .NET 8
  • Obsolete ImageSource.FromResource #15225
    .NET 8
  • The Blazor MAUI app crashes on Windows when an InputFile is used #15224
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Windows does not show datalist dropdown #15136
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MauiHybrid <datalist> element no longer working #15149
  • Request to add function to Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.EntryHandler. #12276
    Backlog
  • Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its view #14052
    Backlog
  • Deploying the App in Release Version Crash on Android Physical Device but works if deployed as Debug Version #7860
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Scrollview control not working properly in .Net MAUI (Android) #8427
    Backlog
  • DatePicker displays differently on iOS and Mac #8495
    Backlog
  • [Android] Animated FontSize does not update width and causes text to disappear #8496
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use PrependToMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs (Backport #14704) #15208
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0.1 to 1.9.0 #15206
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Implements Color.Equal() correctly #15218
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
